TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ImageElement extends MonoTouch.Dialog.Element

Docs.summary: Element to pick images from the local photo library.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class MonoTouch.UIKit.UIImage image) cil managed

Docs.param: Image that represents the current selection.
Docs.summary: Creates an instance of the image selector element.
Subclasses that override the GetCell method should override this method as well
Docs.value: Unique NSString value, typically the underlying value is allocated as a static variable.
Docs.remarks: This method should return the key passed to UITableView.DequeueReusableCell. If your code overrides the method to change the cell, you must also override this method and return a unique key for it. This works in most subclasses with a couple of exceptions: StringElement and various derived classes do not use this setting as they need a wider range of keys for different uses, so you need to look at the source code for those if you are trying to override StringElement or StyledStringElement.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class MonoTouch.UIKit.UITableViewCell GetCell(class MonoTouch.UIKit.UITableView tv) cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets a UITableViewCell for this element. Can be overridden, but if you customize the style or contents of the cell you must also override the CellKey property in your derived class.
Docs.remarks: This is part of the machinery required by UITableView. This method is only ever used by developers creating new MonoTouch.Dialog Elements and is not intended to be used by consumers of the API.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void Selected (MonoTouch.Dialog.DialogViewController dvc, MonoTouch.UIKit.UITableView tableView, MonoTouch.Foundation.NSIndexPath path);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance void Selected(class MonoTouch.Dialog.DialogViewController dvc, class MonoTouch.UIKit.UITableView tableView, class MonoTouch.Foundation.NSIndexPath path) cil managed

Docs.param: The where the selection took place
The that contains the Section and Row for the element.
Docs.summary: Invoked when the given element has been selected by the user.

Docs.remarks: If the user picked a new image, this property will have the user's new selection.
